posts.post_title: For Sale - T205 Camnitz American Beauty
posts.post_content:
Howie Camnitz - American Beauty Green - PSA 4 - $160.00
PP F&F to: [url]rockyhillconnecticut@aol.com[/url] and shipping is on me. Earliest Private Message to me with "I'll take it" wins it. I try to check my messages every few hours. Thanks for looking.
[IMG]http://www.comicplace.com/net54raw/camnitzfront.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.comicplace.com/net54raw/camnitzback.jpg[/IMG]
Is that paper loss on the front and over his eye also?
Nothing on his eye. Must have been something on the scanner. The white spot is on the card. Its real hard to tell if its paper loss but seems like color flake. The plastic makes it real hard to tell.
